text: Paul Kozachuk (born May 12, 1994) is a professional Canadian football linebacker for the Toronto Argonauts of the Canadian Football League (CFL). He played U Sports football for the Toronto Varsity Blues from 2014 to 2017. ==Professional career== ===Montreal Alouettes=== Kozachuk was drafted by the Montreal Alouettes in the sixth round, 46th overall, in the 2018 CFL Draft and signed with the club on May 19, 2018. He made his professional debut on June 16, 2018 against the BC Lions. For the 2018 season, he played in 13 regular season games, recording nine special teams tackles. In 2019, he played in 17 regular season games, where he had one defensive tackle and eight special teams tackles. He made his post-season debut in the team's East Semi-Final loss to the Edmonton Eskimos where he had one special teams tackle. ===Toronto Argonauts=== After becoming a free agent, Kozachuk signed with the Toronto Argonauts on February 18, 2020. ==References== ==External links== *Toronto Argonauts bio Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Toronto Varsity Blues football players Category:Canadian football linebackers Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from London, Ontario
title: Paul Kozachuk
